title: Odd Parity Checker for DWord
name: LGF_IsParityOdd
description: The function checks whether the parity of the input variable of type DWord is odd.

input.name: doubleWord
input.description: Variable for which the parity is to be determined.

return_value.description: TRUE: When the number of bits that are assigned `TRUE` is odd

description_zh: 一个函数FC，该函数用于检查一个双字（DWord）类型输入变量的奇偶性。函数通过计算输入变量中置为`TRUE`的位数，如果位数是奇数，则返回`TRUE`。函数使用位操作来高效地计算奇偶性，避免了逐位检查的繁琐过程。函数不使用ENO机制，因为在执行过程中不可能产生错误。
